title: Payton Tolle ranked Red Sox’ 2026 No. 1 prospect by Baseball America

title: Vehicle damaged after bricks fall from building in the North End
author: Morgan Rousseau
bullets: Local News The bricks fell from a building on Hanover Street on Sunday morning.
ShareSend this article to your social connections.
Several bricks fell from a North End building Sunday, damaging a vehicle below but causing no injuries.

title: Driver killed in early morning Thanksgiving crash involving tractor-trailer on I-95
author: Morgan Rousseau
bullets: Local News Carlos Chavez Martinez, 28, of Providence, was killed after his Audi collided with a tractor-trailer that was parked at a rest stop.
A Providence man was killed in an early-morning crash in North Attleboro on Thanksgiving, according to the Bristol County District Attorney’s Office.
Carlos Chavez Martinez, 28, of Providence, died from his injuries after the white Audi sedan he was driving collided with a parked tractor-trailer around 2:30 a.

title: Celtics center Amari Williams earns praise from Jaylen Brown in his NBA debut
author: Aidan Buchanan
bullets: Boston Celtics "That was impressive from Amari, I'm not going to lie.
" Amari Williams played in his first professional game Wednesday night against the Pistons (Erin Clark/Globe Staff).
While the Celtics are missing their starting center Neemias Queta with an ankle injury, they seem to have found a suitable replacement.
